solidstack.io
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.io.Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassPathResource, FileResource, InputStreamResource, MemoryResource, StringResource, SystemInOutResource, URIResource
public class Resource
extends Object

Represents a resource.

Author:
René de Bloois

Method Detail

supportsURL

public boolean supportsURL()
Returns:
True if this resource has a URL and URI, false otherwise.

exists

public boolean exists()
Returns:
True if the resource exists, false otherwise.

getLastModified

public long getLastModified()
Returns:
The last modified time in milliseconds.

getURL

public URL getURL()
Returns:
The URL of this resource.

getURI

public URI getURI()
Returns:
The URI of this resource.

newInputStream

public InputStream newInputStream()
                           throws FileNotFoundException
Returns:
A new InputStream to read from the resource.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the resource is not found.

supportsReader

public boolean supportsReader()
Returns:
True if newReader() is supported, false otherwise.

newReader

public Reader newReader()
                 throws FileNotFoundException
Returns:
A new Reader to read from the resource.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the resource is not found.

getOutputStream

public OutputStream getOutputStream()
Returns:
An OutputStream to write to the resource.

resolve

public Resource resolve(String path)
Constructs a new resource by resolving the given path against this resource.

Parameters:
path - The path to resolve against this resource.
Returns:
The resulting resource.

getPathFrom

public URI getPathFrom(Resource base)
Calculates a relative path from the given resource to this resource.

Parameters:
base - The resource to calculate the relative path from.
Returns:
The relative path from the given resource to this resource.

getNormalized

public String getNormalized()
Returns:
A normalized path to this resource.

unwrap

public Resource unwrap()
Returns:
A resource that better implements the capabilities of the actual resource.

getLocation

public SourceLocation getLocation()
Returns:
The location of the resource.

setGZip

public void setGZip(boolean gzip)
Indicate that this resource is gzipped or not.

Parameters:
gzip - True indicates that this resource is gzipped.

isGZip

public boolean isGZip()
Returns:
True indicates that this resource is gzipped.
